title: Credit scores can shape your financial life. So can the algorithms behind them.
itunes:title: Credit scores can shape your financial life. So can the algorithms behind them.
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description:
In the first installment of our series “The Score,” we look at the credit-score algorithms that influence so much of our financial lives.

Your donation powers the journalism you rely on. Give today to support Marketplace Tech.
